entities.name: Charte Informatique
entities.description: Internal IT Charter of SYSTRAN.

entities.name: système d'information
entities.description: Information system of SYSTRAN, subject to security policies and monitoring.

entities.name: système d’information et de communication numérique
entities.description: Digital information and communication system of SYSTRAN, subject to internal regulations regarding abuse.

entities.name: système de traitement automatisé
entities.description: Automated data processing system, subject to legal penalties for fraudulent data manipulation.

entities.name: intranet
entities.description: SYSTRAN's internal network platform where the IT Charter is made available to employees.

entities.name: outils numériques
entities.description: Digital tools used by employees, subject to recommended usage practices.

entities.name: Autorités Publiques Compétentes
entities.description: Competent public authorities to whom SYSTRAN's data may be communicated upon judicial requisition.

entities.name: Conseils Juridiques
entities.roleInContext: Recipient of data in case of judicial requisition.

entities.name: Détection de comportements malveillants
entities.description: Purpose for recording data, to detect malicious behavior.

entities.name: Politiques de sécurité de l'entreprise
entities.description: Company security policies, which recorded data helps to enforce.

entities.name: Dysfonctionnements du système d'information
entities.description: Purpose for recording data, to detect information system malfunctions.

entities.name: Analyse a posteriori d'incidents de sécurité
entities.description: Purpose for recording data, for post-incident security analysis.

entities.name: Conformité réglementaire
entities.description: Purpose for recording data, to conform to texts and regulations in force.

entities.name: Contrôle du respect de la charte
entities.description: Purpose for recording data, to control adherence to the IT Charter.

entities.name: Fraude Informatique
entities.description: Illegal act involving computer systems, subject to specific penalties defined by the Penal Code.

entities.name: Respect du droit d’auteur
entities.description: Compliance with copyright law.

entities.name: Contrefaçon
entities.description: Act of counterfeiting, subject to civil and criminal penalties defined by the Intellectual Property Code.
Fine for alteration or suppression of data, accompanied by 2 years prison.
Fine for fraudulently introducing, suppressing, or modifying data, accompanied by 3 years prison.
Fine for counterfeiting, accompanied by 3 years prison.
The date from which the SYSTRAN IT Charter became applicable.
Version and date of the SYSTRAN IT Charter document.
SYSTRAN's internal regulations, to which the IT Charter is an annex and which define disciplinary sanctions.

entities.breakdownDescription: Employees of SYSTRAN who are informed about the IT Charter and digital tool usage.

entities.name: Techniques de sécurité
entities.description: Security techniques implemented within SYSTRAN that users must be informed about.

entities.officeSpecificInfo: Location associated with SYSTRAN's intranet resources.
